attributes.action: Stop MPs from taking a 2nd job whilst serving. Unless professionally needed
attributes.additional_details: MPs are well paid, have huge expenses paid for from the public purse, subsidised meals and drinks in Parliament and many have second homes which should they are allowed to keep and sell having left Parliament
attributes.background: It’s simple we want to stop MPs taking unnecessary second jobs with private companies just to obtain remuneration

rejection.details:
It's not clear what you mean by jobs that are "professionally needed", but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban second jobs for Members of Parliament: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630900
